Articles.Content:
Renaming various english word via dictionary is not helping. The german translation is filled with cryptic, nonsensical terms. I've played visual novels that had better machine translation than this game, given they are not on the subject of orbital mechanics. I've seen streamers despair while figuring out basic functions. Imo it would be better to ditch the translation entirely. Tell me why I'm wrong.

Edited July 29, 2021 by PaulT
